When your personal quota limit is reached, all your resources are stopped automatically, and you can launch them again only when the new month begins.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The quota depends on the user's job function. For example, if you are a Level 3 specialist, your monthly quota allows running a small Linux VM.
